name: Fidelity National Financial, Inc.
description: Fidelity National Financial, Inc. (FNF) is a leading provider of title insurance and transaction services to the real estate and mortgage industries. Founded in 1847, FNF has grown to become one of the largest title insurance companies in the United States, serving millions of customers every year. The company operates through several subsidiaries that offer a diverse range of services including title insurance, escrow services, and other related real estate transaction services. FNF’s extensive network of agents, underwriters, and technology-driven solutions enable it to efficiently manage the complexities of real estate transactions. In addition to title insurance, FNF is also involved in the provision of technology solutions for the real estate industry, including software and services designed to streamline the closing process. The company has a strong commitment to innovation, continually seeking to enhance its offerings through technology advancements. FNF is also recognized for its focus on customer service and operational excellence, ensuring that its clients receive the highest quality of service throughout their transaction process. With its robust financial position and strategic acquisitions, Fidelity National Financial is well-positioned to continue leading the title insurance market.

seo.meta_title: Fidelity National Financial, Inc. | Title Insurance and Transaction Services
seo.meta_description: Discover Fidelity National Financial, Inc., a leader in title insurance and transaction services for real estate. Learn about FNF's extensive offerings and commitment to innovation.

faq.question: What does Fidelity National Financial do?
faq.answer: Fidelity National Financial provides title insurance and transaction services to the real estate and mortgage industries.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Fidelity National Financial?
faq.answer: Mike Nolan is the CEO of Fidelity National Financial, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Fidelity National Financial headquartered?
faq.answer: Fidelity National Financial is headquartered in Jacksonville, Florida, USA.

faq.question: What are the main products of Fidelity National Financial?
faq.answer: FNF's main products include title insurance, escrow services, and technology solutions for real estate transactions.

faq.question: When was Fidelity National Financial founded?
faq.answer: Fidelity National Financial was founded in 1847.
